meanings.definition: The mouth of a largemouth bass, a type of fish.
meanings.sent1: The largemouth of the bass helps it catch prey easily.
meanings.sent2: The largemouth bass opened its mouth wide to catch the small fish.
meanings.sent3: The largemouth of the bass looked like it could fit a whole apple!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as wide as a largemouth, showing her excitement.
meanings.sent5: The largemouth of the bass was big enough to swallow a small frog whole.

meanings.sent1: The frog was surprised by the largemouth catfish's huge mouth.
meanings.sent2: The largemouth frog caught insects easily with its wide mouth.
meanings.sent3: The largemouth dog tried to fit a whole tennis ball in its mouth!
meanings.sent4: The largemouth entrance to the cave seemed to swallow the light.
meanings.sent5: Her largemouth smile lit up the room with joy.
